article_title: UPDATE: Idaho Governor Target of Latest Attack Site
article_text: Increase the value of your home by updating your flooring. We'll help you out!

article_metadata.author: KIMBERLEE KRUESI, Associated Press

og.description: BOISE, Idaho (AP) — Idaho's third-party gubernatorial candidate is following the lead of the state's largest business lobbyist group and has launched an attack website criticizing incumbent Gov. C.L. "Butch"
